result.title: City4Age frailty and MCI risk model, v3 final (M36)
result.description: Starting from the needs and unmet needs of the elderly population represented by the 6 Test Beds, this task will define a model of risks for frailty and MCI that will be the basic scientific rationale for the City4Age approach and the guidance in designing the approach to the problem and the interventions. It will consider several dimensions: including social, physical, mental. It will put together both the contributions from the geriatric science and the evidence coming from the organisations involved in the care process. This task will also consider the advances made in EIP AHA, in particular by the “commitments” involved in action A3 (Frailty) in understanding the various dimensions of the problem and the evidence gathered so far. V3, final iteration.

result.title: Final multi-platform learning resource integration
result.description: The finalised learning resources developed with the use of SlideWiki and delivered via MOOCs, LMSs, eBooks and social networks will be included in this deliverable. It will describe the complete integration approach targeting all systems required by the SlideWiki pilot trial partners and thus include adapters to both MOC platforms FutureLearn and OpenCast, support for at least the three LMS Moodle, ILIAS and OLAT as well as support for the integration with several social networks.

result.title: Ethics Report, v3, final
result.description: "This Deliverable will report on the tasks performed by the Ethics Panel as described under WP1 description. The first version, at month 10, will report on the ""initial study of the ethical implications of the project"" and any additional action plans established, it will contain copies of ethical approvals for the collection of personal data by the competent authorities. It will be updated at the end of year2 (second review) and at the end of the project."

result.title: D3.15 Privacy and identity protection: requirements and implementation
result.description: This report will highlight the latest version of the design choices and the adopted technologies concerning the privacy and identity protection issues affecting the data capturing architecture, including the necessary technical specifications and requirements and the mechanisms available to preserve privacy within the Linked Data domain.

result.title: Ethics Report v2
result.description: "This Deliverable will report on the tasks performed by the Ethics Panel as described under WP1 description. The first version, at month 10, will report on the ""initial study of the ethical implications of the project"" and any additional action plans established, it will contain copies of ethical approvals for the collection of personal data by the competent authorities. It will be updated at the end of year2 (second review) and at the end of the project."

result.description: This deliverable will contain adapters for an initial set of platforms and an initial set of learning resources delivered via MOOCs, LMSs, eBooks and social networks. In this deliverable, we will address a subset of the platforms (i.e. one MOOC, one LMS, one social network).
